topic.title: Any furry zites?
topic.body: is there any good furry sites out here in zeronet?  Just wondering :)

topic.title: Movie Recommendations
topic.body: Looking for some good movies, ones where the protagonist goes through some sort of transformation. Not necessarily like a werewolf like situation, but like Avatar, District 9, and such. Any Ideas or recommendations?

1538188815_1NcVwrBpf91ownXuSgYnHBZCWjoiN.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_144_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Asking for a friend?

can't ask for something I don't have :)

> [homegrown](#comment_6_1NgGmtujKtMKxc3VprPMUneYYjgJqJFbhX): Pls God no, no stop

Plz God no, no, stop*
"no stop" sounds like you want me to continue

1542493737_1JBYQxMSEnfbSmrJwFXn5K2ukfuv5.body:
> [nekololi](#comment_305_1FzZsDQdh8wk71bDLxURPzmAt2FXehoNAB): probably just create a symbolic link between your zeronet site directory and the directory where the web server you configured for the tor hidden service is looking for the site? [...]

well im kinda wanting the onion link but also the decentralization.  Im wanting it to remail up even while my device is offline
